game.title: Eternal Realms: Shadowfall
game.synopsis: In a world where magic and technology coexist, the realm of Tenebrous is threatened by an ancient evil that seeks to consume all in its path. As a skilled warrior-mage, you must navigate treacherous landscapes, forge unlikely alliances, and master powerful magical abilities to prevent the downfall of your world.
game.beginning: Players start in the humble village of Brindlemark, where rumors begin to spread of a dark presence lurking in the nearby Shadowwood forest. As the chosen hero, you must investigate these rumors and put an end to whatever evil is brewing.
game.ending: Ultimately, it's up to you to face the mastermind behind the Shadowfall: a powerful sorceress named Lyraea, who seeks to spread her dark influence across all of Tenebrous. Defeat her in a final showdown and restore balance to the realm, or succumb to the darkness and become forever lost in the Shadowwood.
